snippet: Brokers and developers in New York say the hedge fund manager Daniel S. Loeb and his wife are quietly seeking buyers for their 10,674-square-foot space at 15 Central Park West, and are rumored to be asking for $100 million, The New York Times...
abstract: Brokers and developers in New York say the hedge fund manager Daniel S. Loeb and his wife are quietly seeking buyers for their 10,674-square-foot space at 15 Central Park West, and are rumored to be asking for $100 million, The New York Times reports.

headline.main: Daniel Loeb Said to Be Shopping His Penthouse
